task.title: How to subtract numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the subtraction features of the JPS Calculator app. This is an exmaple of a high-level DITA topic. Tasks are the majority of the content types used in software documentation.

prereq.p: To successfully subtract numbers, you must know what subtraction is.

taskbody.result: The result from the subtraction is displayed.
taskbody.example:
You want to subtract 2 from 3. The equation will look like 3-2=1. You enter 3. Press minus. Enter 2. Press equals.
The result 1 appears on the screen.
